Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.example

Class AsyncClientExample

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.example.AsyncClientExample
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
@Private public class AsyncClientExample extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
A simple example shows how to use asynchronous client.
